TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Mayl’ux, title = Mayl’ux, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mayl’ux} }

S.FORM: Mayl'ux Itiniay i Wufeng Cen no Hsinchu ko Mayl'ux a niyaro', 62 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 143 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 89% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 127 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 11% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 16 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 72%, Saysiyat 12%, Amis 3%, Bunun 1%, Truku 1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

Mayl'ox Itiniay i Wofeng Cen no Hsincho ko Mayl'ox a niyaro', 62 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 143 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 89% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 127 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 11% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 16 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 72%, Saysiyat 12%, Amis 3%, Bonon 1%, Troko 1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
